description.problem: JAMES AI assistant voice output is not working - no audio heard when JAMES responds
description.goal: Find root cause of TTS (Text-to-Speech) failure and fix it

steps: Check if TTS is using Web Speech API or Tauri command
Look for any try/catch blocks that might be silently catching errors
Check browser console for TTS-related errors
Verify voiceSettings.enabled is true in settings.store.ts
Test if neuralVoice 'en-GB-RyanNeural' is available on system

success_criteria: Voice audio plays when JAMES responds

description.problem: Chat tab does not show JAMES text responses - messages not visible
description.goal: Find why chat messages are not rendering and fix it

steps: Verify setMessages is being called with new messages
Check if messages array is populated but not rendering
Look for CSS issues (hidden, opacity, z-index)
Check for conditional rendering that might hide messages

description.problem: Runtime errors may occur during app usage
description.goal: Find and fix runtime errors from console/logs
